name: Adventure Story (itch)
description:
There are no graphics other than 1 bad one adding more making the graphics better and better no pictures at all

DO NOT EDIT

This game was made in batch there are not many colors so if you are completely color blind you wouldn't notice

When i was trying to add graphics i ended up making a dog by accident

should it be a feature?

Comment yes if it should or comment no if it shouldn't

also the website won't let me add buttons

I have a habit of saving after every line
